Flicker::

Flicker thinks for a moment.  "He must be on his way back from that 
meeting with the other commanders."

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Perceptor::
> 
> "I shouldn't recomend that "replied Perceptor "Maximal's allies 
might 
> come... and we'd have to retreat... just do it when we're sure to 
> win. We're starting the battle, so victory is unsure right now... 
Do 
> you know where is Prime? "
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > Flicker::
> > 
> > "Flicker here," the spy acknowledges.  "I've devised a means of 
> > incapacitating one of the Maximals so I can use them as a 
hostage, 
> > and I may be able to sabotage the shields to let you guys in.  
> What's 
> > happening on your end?"
> >

> > > Perceptor::
> > > 
> > > "Thanks master"replied Percptor by comm link, after that he 
> opened 
> > it 
> > > (in that way that anyelse could heard) and said "Flicker, Do 
you 
> > > copy??? Do you have something to report?" 
> > > 
> > > 
> > >

> > > > Flicker::
> > > > 
> > > > "Come on, come on, just a few more seconds ..." the bot in 
> > question 
> > > > mutters under his breath as he toils away in the medbay.  
He's 
> > > > working on a device to paralyze a single transformer, which 
> would 
> > > > give him the perfect opporunity to use the same as a 
> > > hostage.  "Done!"

> prove

Flicker..."
